title: What is the advantage of broadband Internet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Broadband Internet provides a Wi-Fi connection in your home or office. It also has much better speeds owing to a larger bandwidth. If you are looking for a good broadband connection, you should check out Airtel’s plans for your city. They are cost-effective, you can connect up to 10 devices on a single connection, and the network quality is superb.

Advantages of broadband internet. The high bandwidth associated with the broadband facilitates fast data transfer in large volumes. The broadband Internet provides fast connecting speeds that are many time higher than the traditional dial-up connection.
